title: 客户端一进服务器崩溃
author: SlumberPenguin
txt_content: [12:38:25] [Client thread/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: The jar file D:\BaiduNetdiskDownload\北极客户端\.minecraft\libraries\net\java\jinput\jinput\2.0.5\jinput-2.0.5.jar has a security seal for path net.java.games.input, but that path is defined and not secure

replies.author: 雲都
replies.txt_content: 客户端核心的问题，推荐重新制作一个客户端

replies.author: 滢岚
replies.txt_content: 您可以考虑将客户端.minecraft/libraries文件夹删除让启动器重新下载。从崩溃报错上来看，这是因为其中的jinput-2.0.5.jar 有安全加密导致的
